page.title: 01Ben Cruachan Ridge
page.content:
GEOLOGY - Hard granite, changing to phylite on south facing slopes.
WEATHER - Average rainfall 2921mm per year. Prevailing west wind.
EMPLOYMENT - Aqueduct maint. 2 men and Land Rover and allterrain vehicle clear rubble, check rainfall. Sheep farming work for 2 shepherds and dogs.
LEISURE - Peaks at 1009, 997, 964, 980 metres, steep ridge and changeable weather provide regular fatalities. Climbing, walking, ice climbing, spectacular views.
NATURAL HISTORY - Arctic/Alpine flora, notable 2 carniverous plants, Red Deer, Buzzards, Harriers, Golden Eagles, Black Faced Sheep, occasional migrant stopping place.
